snippet: Two states with the worst records for health coverage see no reason to do much about it.
abstract: Editorial criticizes leaders in Texas and Florida for Census Bureau report that finds an alarming percentage of people in those states that are without health insurance; censures states for being among the most resistant in the nation to providing coverage for the uninsured under the Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Two states with the worst records for health coverage see no reason to do much about it.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
